original_text: Those that were numbered of them, even of the tribe of Naphtali, were fifty and three thousand and four hundred.
korean_text: 납달리 지파에서 계수된 자는 오만 삼천사백 명이었더라

sentences.original_text: Those that were numbered of them
even of the tribe of Naphtali
were fifty and three thousand and four hundred
